name: 3D Op Art Sphere Target
description:
13=03-20
Collaboration with the guy who live in my basement also known as Dominic Pons (Xponentialdesign). As we often did during those days my and my friend Dom would sit in the same room in front of our computers each making our daily projets. I would often make 3D elements for him as he would help me with particle systems and after effect editing. Dom created a version in After effects and I created this op art scene setup in cinema 4D  before I rendered it he insisted on using the latest GSG Hdri Link for the lighting. I listened to his advice and this is what came at the end od the render.

Since I dont use giphy at all he posted it here
https://giphy.com/gifs/cinema4d-everyday-target-KcDynUpadoYbGH2fbr
